title: ISO 22467:2021
description: Traditional Chinese medicine — Determination of microorganisms in natural products
cleaned_text: Abstract [Preview](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/en/#!iso:std:73288:en) This document specifies test methods to determine microorganisms in natural products.
